critique: The document pertains to the Emergency Relief Appropriation Act of 1935 and authorizes the Director of Procurement of the Treasury Department to certify and approve vouchers and schedules of disbursements chargeable to any appropriation-allocation under the Act. It focuses on the procurement of materials, supplies, and equipment, and the reimbursement of the Work Relief Supply Fund. The document ensures that vouchers are for legitimate purchases and that there is documentary evidence of receipt by the requisitioning department or agency.
